tags.instrumentation.name: tracetest
github.com/j2gg0s/otsql
tags.service.name: tracetest
tags.sql.query:
SELECT t.test, d.definition
	FROM tests t
	JOIN definitions d ON d.test_id = t.id AND d.test_version = t.version
 WHERE t.id = $1 ORDER BY t.version DESC LIMIT 1
